name: Lester Holt
Bias Analysis: Political Views: Lester Holt was a registered Republican until 2018. At that time, he left the Republican Party, becoming unaffiliated with any party. In 2016, former President Trump falsely accused Lester Holt of being a Democrat as he was a Republican at the time. Holt is also a Christian, which he says informs how he looks at stories, although he does not view his newscast as an outlet for his own opinions. Lester Holt generally keeps his opinions to himself and directly reports the news.
Scientific Views: Supports the consensus of science on Climate Change and Covid-19.
Social Views: We cannot find any information on his social views. He states he is Christian.

name: Laura Ingraham
Bias Analysis: Political Views: Laura Ingraham is a vocal supporter of former  President Donald Trump with controversial views on immigration, LGBTQ rights, and race. She has faced criticism for her comments directed towards Greta Thunberg, LeBron James, immigrants, and Parkland shooting survivor David Hogg.
Scientific Views: She has expressed skepticism about the effectiveness of vaccines and has made controversial statements about COVID-19, including promoting unproven treatments.

Social Views: Laura Ingraham has faced criticism for her controversial views on race, immigration, and LGBTQ rights. Newsweek; reports in 1984, she secretly recorded a confidential LGBTQ support group at Dartmouth College and published a transcript that outed closeted students, causing harm to their privacy and safety. This incident reflects Ingraham’s history of controversial behavior. In an interview, her brother, who is gay, revealed that their father was a Nazi sympathizer, racist, anti-Semite, and homophobe, shedding light on her early experiences. Additionally, Ingraham has been accused of making racist and xenophobic comments, including a statement about Mexicans, Laura Ingraham: Mexicans Have Come Here To Murder And Rape Our People.”

name: Benny Johnson
Bias Analysis: Political Views: Benny Johnson is a conservative activist known for supporting conservative causes and figures. He strongly supports former President Donald Trump. According to a Media Matters article, Benny Johnson appears to be arguing that Donald Trump, as the embodiment of the executive branch during his presidency, had a claim to the classified documents he took. This perspective seems to challenge the traditional view that such documents are government property. He frequently reports negatively on Democrats and promotes conspiracy theories. According to Politico, Benny Johnson, the Chief Content Officer at Independent Journal Review (IJR), was suspended along with two others for sharing a post that spread a conspiracy theory about former President Obama.

Scientific Views: Benny Johnson rejects the scientific consensus on climate change and made a video stating that Fossil fuels make life better for every single human being on the planet.” He also has promoted misinformation regarding covid-19 and vaccines.

Social Views: Benny Johnson’s social views regarding LGBTQ issues appear to be strongly conservative and opposed, as he expresses opposition to transgender individuals, emphasizes his Christian faith, and calls for a boycott of Bud Light products.

name: Megyn Kelly
Bias Analysis: Political Views: While Kelly has not identified with any political party, some of her views align with conservative and right-leaning perspectives. She has been criticized for making controversial statements on race and gender issues, but she has also been praised for her coverage of sexual harassment allegations against powerful men in media and politics.
Scientific Views: Megyn Kelly supports the consensus of science on most issues; however, in 2022, she made the false claim that the covid-19 vaccine was causing children to die.

Social Views: Megyn Kelly has been vocal on the issues such as sexual harassment, women’s empowerment, and workplace experiences. However, some of her coverage has faced criticism. According to Glaad.org, her coverage of the Masterpiece Cakeshop case was biased against the LGBTQ community and lacked balance. Additionally, The Advocate reports that during a conversation about the experiences of transgender people on her Sirius XM show, she referred to it as the trans trend.” With regard to race, Megyn Kelly’s show was canceled by NBC in 2018 following her controversial remarks about blackface.

name: Larry Kudlow
Bias Analysis: Political Views: Larry Kudlow is a staunch conservative and vocal supporter of free-market capitalism, tax cuts, and deregulation. He has often criticized progressive economic policies and has been a proponent of supply-side economics. His tenure in the Trump administration further solidified his conservative economic views.
Scientific Views: Kudlow has expressed skepticism about the extent of human contribution to climate change and has criticized policies aimed at aggressively combating global warming.

Social Views: Kudlow’s social views align with conservative principles. Kudlow is a Catholic convert and has often spoken about the importance of faith in his life, especially during his recovery from alcohol and drug addiction in the early to mid-1990s. Further, Larry Kudlow has identified himself as pro-life and has expressed his opposition to abortion, and has supported pro-life policies.

name: Tomi Lahren
Bias Analysis: Political Views: Tomi Lahren is a vocal conservative commentator known for her monologues and strong support for conservative policies. She has been a supporter of former President Donald Trump and has frequently criticized liberal ideologies and the Democratic Party, and Biden.

Scientific Views: Lahren has expressed skepticism about climate change, calling it simply bad weather.” She also frequently hosts guests who either claim climate change is a hoax or downplay the human role. Tomi Lahren has been flagged for misinformation regarding the Covid-19 and has stated, I’m not an anti-vaxxer” I’m an unvaccinated COVID vaccine skeptic and for damn good reason!”

Social Views: Tomi Lahren has made headlines for her controversial statements on issues like immigration, gun rights, and the Black Lives Matter movement. For example, in a now-deleted tweet, she compared BLM to the KKK. However, she has also shown a more moderate stance on certain issues, such as being pro-choice, which led to backlash from some conservative circles. Finally, Lahren has been a vocal supporter of the culture war against so-called woke ideology.

name: Mark Levin
Bias Analysis: Political Views: Mark Levin is a prominent conservative commentator. He has consistently voiced his support for conservative policies and has been critical of liberal ideologies. His show Life, Liberty & Levin” on Fox News frequently features discussions that lean towards conservative viewpoints. Levin’s support for former President Donald Trump is evident in headlines from his official website, such as Levin: Trump’s Lawyers Should Ask SCOTUS to Stop Unconstitutional Prosecutions” and Joe Biden Longed for Donald Trump Prosecution over January 6.” Further, he frequently promoted Donald Trump’s stolen election narrative, including claiming on his show that the Fake Elector” plan in which Trump has been charged was legal. He has also been critical of the Democratic Party on numerous occasions.

Scientific Views: Mark Levin is skeptical about climate change, referencing a review that highlighted past climate predictions that didn’t materialize. He has referred to these as eco-pocalyptic predictions” and believes they are often used to further political agendas. Levin has prompted conspiracy theories regarding Covid-19, such as the Lab Leak Theory, and falsely claimed that Covid vaccines were not tested.

Social Views: Mark Levin has made controversial remarks regarding the LGBTQ community, notably comparing it to bestiality during his radio show, a statement that drew criticism for its derogatory nature. Additionally, he has defended the replacement theory,” a conspiracy theory associated with white supremacist ideologies, suggesting Democrats believe the white-dominant society has been around too long, so it’s time to end it.” This stance highlights his far-right perspective on immigration. Finally, Levin strongly supports the 2nd amendment and rejects gun control measures to curb mass shootings stating that adding Judeo-Christian prayer in school is a means to reduce the problem.

name: Martha MacCallum
Bias Analysis: Political Views: According to Hollywood Reporter, Martha MacCallum has not declared a party.  However, she has been criticized for her interviews with conservative figures, which some viewers perceive as more favorable. While MacCallum tends to favor conservatives, she has been critical of former President Trump regarding his claims of a stolen election: It is very compelling, and the lack of evidence is the huge stunning clear moment here where these people are saying look I supported you, please give me something to work with, and it simply doesn’t materialize.”

Scientific Views: Martha MacCallum has expressed skepticism about human impact on climate change, attributing it primarily to natural causes like volcanic activity. In a recent episode of her show, she expressed vaccine hesitancy with this statement regarding Bronny James and Myocarditis I think a lot of people see these situations, and it does raise questions about the vaccine.”

Social Views: MacCallum’s social views are largely unknown. However, based on her comments during a Fox Business’ Varney & Co. interview, Martha MacCallum appears to advocate for stricter border control and an organized immigration process. Regarding abortion, she has criticized Democratically controlled states for allowing abortion seekers to cross state lines for abortions. Finally, she has defended former President Trump’s LGBTQ record I’ve never seen or read or heard anything in President Trump’s dialogue that says that he wants to turn the clock back to a time when Americans were prosecuted for being gay.” These views are evidence of a moderately conservative perspective.
